name: Flickr: Remove Yahoo universal navigation bar
description: This will remove the Yahoo navbar (or toolbar) from the top of Flickr pages. In addition, you may want this one too: http://userstyles.org/styles/90062/un-float-the-big-black-flickr-nav-bar . This will un-float the big black Flickr nav-bar to free-up screen space. i.e. the black Flickr nav-bar will stay at the top of each Flickr page (and scroll with the rest of the page, like it used to do). Check all my other Stylish scripts here. If you find this useful, you can buy me a drink! (or make a donation with the green button at the bottom of this page). Before installing this user-style, you must first install Stylish for Chrome or Stylish for Firefox, see "Notes" below. ▼ To install, click "Install with Stylish" just below ▼
